author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
We're back with The Indie Hour Episode Twenty-Nine! This series focuses on games you may have never even heard of and gives us an inside look at the wider world of independantly published Tabletop Wargames of all genres.

Have you watched all fifteen seasons of a TV show where two hunks prevent all manner of supernatural apocalypses? Have you watched a maniac FBI agent and his soul-weary PHD partner try to punch aliens? Are you obsessed with Ghost Exterminators putting the grift on New York City? Then Osprey and Patrick Todoroff (ZONA Alfa, NIGHTWATCH) have a game for you. Let's dive in! 

Check out the the rulebook in digital  HERE: https://www.wargamevault.com/product/469115/When-Nightmares-Come-An-Investigative-Wargame-of-Supernatural-Horror?affiliate_id=210041
title: The GMG Indie Hour Ep 029 -WHEN NIGHTMARES COME by Patrick Todoroff & Osprey Games
